sourcesContent:
//import dollarUSLocale from "../../utils/dollarUSLocale"; import dollarUSLocaleNoDigits from "../../utils/dollarUSLocaleNoDigits"; import outputCSS from "../../scss/output.module.css"; const OutputTCO = ({ gasZTR, cashPurchase }) => { return (
  • gas ZTR {dollarUSLocaleNoDigits.format( gasZTR.TCOofGasZTR )}
  • NGBR
  • + batteries & chargers {dollarUSLocaleNoDigits.format( cashPurchase.TCOofNGBR )}
  • with FPP {dollarUSLocale.format( NGBRWithFlexiblePowerProgram.depreciationOfBareNGBR + NGBRWithFlexiblePowerProgram.flexiblePowerProgramSubscription + cashPurchase.power + cashPurchase.maintenance )}
); }; export default OutputTCO;
